data.eml:eml: Revision of the odd brachycistidine genus Acanthetropis Wasbauer, 1958 (Hymenoptera, Tiphiidae, Brachycistidinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kimsey, Lynn S., Wasbauer, Marius S. (2015): Revision of the odd brachycistidine genus Acanthetropis Wasbauer, 1958 (Hymenoptera, Tiphiidae, Brachycistidinae). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 44: 19-30, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.44.4691, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.44.4691
